Articles.Content: Hi all! Hope you had a wonderful time! I've been on holidays for 3 weeks now, and I'm just about to go to school!.......yay So instead of having a crapton of time to respond and talk, I'll have to sneakily go on my computer and talk to you wonderful guys for 5 days a week, until 11 weeks later when I get 2 weeks off, running the gauntlet of my IT Department who are in the Dungeon, finding more ways to control our computers and terrify us (KSP.exe fears the Bluebox.dll file finding it!). So until then, gotta go!

38 minutes ago, The_Cat_In_Space said:

Hi all! Hope you had a wonderful time! I've been on holidays for 3 weeks now, and I'm just about to go to school!.......yay So instead of having a crapton of time to respond and talk, I'll have to sneakily go on my computer and talk to you wonderful guys for 5 days a week, until 11 weeks later when I get 2 weeks off, running the gauntlet of my IT Department who are in the Dungeon, finding more ways to control our computers and terrify us (KSP.exe fears the Bluebox.dll file finding it!). So until then, gotta go!

Me too
